General.Name: Pareto Bank ASA
General.Description: Pareto Bank ASA provides various banking products and services in Norway. The company accepts corporate deposits. It also offers corporate financing; receivables financing; residential and commercial financing for land and property; ship financing, including corporate and project financing; and other private or housing loans. Pareto Bank ASA was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

1.Name: Mr. Erling  Mork
1.Title: CFO and Head of Fin. & Accounting
